item.title: Vim 进阶
item.description: Repeat using . and ; // use ' to revert ;, u to revert . var foo = "method("+argument1+","+argument2+")"; f+ to Move, s<space>+<space><Esc> to Change. use ; to repeat search and . to repeat change var foo = "method(" + argument1 + "," + argument2 + ")"; Dot Formula The Ideal: one keystroke to Move, one keystroke to Execute. Act, Repeat, Reverse Operator + Motion = Action (dw、guaw、gcap) Misc 如何在每行的最后加上分号？ 先A; 然后就可以重复j.
